prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: WorldTravelersBlog Title: Exploring Under-the-Radar Culinary Destinations in Southeast Asia Description: Embark on a gastronomic journey through Southeast Asia's lesser-known foodie havens. With insights from local chefs and food critics, we uncover hidden culinary gems in Cambodia, Laos, and Myanmar.
No it seems very long and complicated to me

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: BizFinancePro. Title: Investment 101: An Introductory Guide to Cryptocurrency. Description: Making sense of bitcoins, altcoins, and blockchain technology. Learn the rudiments of investing in cryptocurrency and how it could revolutionize your financial portfolio.
That sounds somewhat interesting. I would like that

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: ArtisticWorlds. Title: Renaissance Masterpieces: Unraveling the Symbolism in Botticelli's Art. Description: Dive into the world of Italian Renaissance as we dissect the symbols hidden in the famous art pieces of Sandro Botticelli. Learn how his unique style and profound understanding of human nature helped shape the art world.

Description: Delve into the scientific links between regular physical activity and mental well-being. Understand how exercise can become a powerful tool in managing stress, anxiety, and depression, aiding your journey towards holistic health.
Not really im not into medical type of stuff

Description: Explore how emerging technologies like AI, blockchain, and IoT could affect climate change. Understand their potential roles in mitigation, adaptation, and creating sustainable future.
No again. These articles don't seem interesting at all to me

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: EntertainmentBuzz. Title: The Evolution of Video Games: A Look Into the Next Decade. Description: Join us as we dive into the fascinating world of video gaming. We'll explore its history, current trends, and what the future holds, including the rise of virtual reality and cloud gaming. Will these advancements redefine entertainment as we know it?
This one looks good. I do like video games and video game history

Learn how to transform your living space with these simple and budget-friendly DIY home improvement ideas. From repurposing old furniture to creating your own home decor, these projects can make your home feel fresh and new.
no. Im not good at dong home renovations much at all

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SpaceUniverse. Title: Extraterrestrial Lifeforms: The Possibility of Life Beyond Earth. Description: Is there life on other planets? Join us as we explore the potential existence of extraterrestrial lifeforms. Uncover the latest scientific theories and research findings, and understand what these could mean for us and for mankind's place in the universe.
This one might be interesting Aliens seem like a good read

Decode your cat's body language, learn why they purr, knead, or bring you 'gifts' and more.

Description: Ever wondered why you see certain posts on your social media feeds? This article breaks down the complex algorithms behind Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter. Learn how these algorithms affect your online interactions and how to use them to your advantage in personal branding or business marketing.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
